source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.4 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 689,133.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Notorious Gladiator's Silk Cord

Transmogrified to:
Notorious Gladiator's Silk Leggings

spells.description:
Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 4.9 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: When the tinker slotted within this device malfunctions, a fuse is flipped to prevent a hazardous outcome.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 135,739 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Drape of Bitter Incantation

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 270,224 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,660 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.
